languages.text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g} area grants allies in the area +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}% increased {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against enemies they are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} from.
languages.original_text: Использование {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на вторую линию дает союзникам внутри этой зоны +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} по противникам, от которых их защищает {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Affecting the <b>Backline</u> area with a stratagem also increases the allies' critical hit chance by +<u>(Strategist's INT+FEL bonus)%</u> against enemies they are in cover from.
Using a stratagem on a Backline area grants allies in the area +(Strategist's INT + FEL bonus)% increased critical hit chance against enemies they are protected by cover from.

Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Backline area grants allies in the area +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}% increased {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against enemies they are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} from.

Использование стратагемы на вторую линию дает союзникам внутри этой зоны +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега)% к шансу критического попадания по противникам, от которых их защищает укрытие.

Использование стратагемы на вторую линию дает союзникам внутри этой зоны +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}% к шансу критического попадания по противникам, от которых их защищает укрытие.

languages.text: 对{g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}后线{/g}区域使用{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}时，可以让该区域内所有盟友获得强化。区域内盟友攻击受到{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}保护的敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}%。

languages.text: Die Anwendung eines {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategems{/g} auf ein {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Abwehrlinie{/g}-Gebiet gewährt dortigen Verbündeten +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} gegen Feinde, vor denen sie durch {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} geschützt sind.

traits.locale_text: Die Anwendung eines {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategems{/g} auf ein Abwehrlinie-Gebiet gewährt dortigen Verbündeten +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} gegen Feinde, vor denen sie durch{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary} Deckung{/g} geschützt sind.

Die Anwendung eines Strategems auf eine Abwehrlinie gewährt Verbündeten in diesem Gebiet +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6} % erhöhte Chance auf {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} gegen Feinde, vor denen sie durch {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}Deckung{/g} geschützt sind.

languages.text: L'utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagème{/g} sur une {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Ligne de fond{/g} confère aux alliés présents dans la zone +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} aux ennemis dont ils sont protégés grâce à leur {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a {g|f:bc99e6ba256f45368bc6bc529e59effd}Backline{/g} area grants allies in the area +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}% increased {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against enemies they are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} from.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation d'un Stratagème sur une Ligne de fond confère aux alliés présents dans la zone +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Stratège) % de chances d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} aux ennemis dont ils sont protégés grâce à leur {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g}.

L'utilisation d'un Stratagème sur une Ligne de fond confère aux alliés présents dans la zone +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6} % de chances d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} aux ennemis dont ils sont protégés grâce à leur {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g}.

languages.text: バックラインエリアに{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用すると、エリア内の味方が、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}に守られた敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}%増加する。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Backline area grants allies in the area +{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}% increased {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against enemies they are protected by {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} from.

traits.locale_text: バックラインエリアに{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用すると、エリア内の味方が、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}に守られた敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}が+{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}%増加する。

バックラインエリアに計略を使用すると、エリア内の味方が、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽{/g}に守られた敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+{uip|CritChanceBonus|e76b4151d3554a369e3801ba27a6a9b6}%増加する。
